description:
Up to Date as at: October 2015.

How to Turn your or a HD Video into a Kindle Book

In this course we will use a HD video from Scott Rea from "The ScottReaProject" namely "How To De-bone And Roll A Chicken."

  • The most in-depth video on, completely boning and rolling a whole chicken,
  • First,we bone a whole Chicken,then stuff it and tie it into a Chicken cushion.
  • Then Scott show how to make,Chicken lollipops from the wings.
  • You end up with a stunning Chicken cushion which not only looks good but is easy to carve.
  • Many thanks to Scott for his permission and sending the Video

We will turn the above Cooking Videos into Kindle book working with 10 Steps

The Step by Step Guide to turn your Cooking Video into a Cookbook for Kindle. Then upload and sell on Kindle Direct Publishing.

List of Material and Tools

  • Video
  • Audio
  • Kindle Storybook Creator
  • Free Video to JPG creator
  • Free MP3 from Video Extractor
Outsourcing
  • Audio to Text via Fiverr
title: How to Turn any HD Video into a Kindle Book in one day
